title: Staff of Arcane Blessing
content:
isleading. Mystra's Blessing improves the spell Bless to add an additional +1d4 to spell attack rolls only. Saves and weapon attack rolls still get just the base +1d4. Bless effects triggered by equipment (e.g. The Whispering Promise) are not buffed.

Weapons Adamantine Longsword ♦ Adamantine Mace ♦ Adamantine Scimitar ♦ Air Myrmidon Flail ♦ Allandra's Whelm ♦ Ambusher ♦ Arcane Absorption Dagger ♦ Arduos Flame Blade ♦ Artificial Leech ♦ Assassin's Shortsword ♦ Assassin's Touch ♦ Balduran's Giant
